name: Improved Order

on: push

jobs:
  hygiene-check:
    name: Hygiene Check
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - name: Checkout Code
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Run Lint Check
        run: npm run lint


  taste-test:
    name: Taste Test
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - name: Checkout Code
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Setup Node.js
        uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: 18

      - name: Install Dependencies
        run: npm install

      - name: Run Unit Tests
        run: npm test


  cook-biryani:
    name: Cook Biryani
    needs: [hygiene-check, taste-test]
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - name: Cooking the Biryani
        run: echo "Cooking Biryani..."


  serve-food:
    name: ğŸš€ Serve Food
    needs: cook-biryani
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - name: Checkout Code
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Setup Node.js
        uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: 18

      - name: ğŸ½ï¸ Serve to Customer
        run: npm run deploy
